extendedInfo.description: 99.7 The Blitz is Your Rock Station! The Blitz Mobile App will let you take âYour Rock Stationâ with you wherever you goâ¦ to work, to school, on a date, in your bedroom, in the bathroom(weird), on the front lawn(why?), in the kitchen, or even in your creepy man-sized treehouse(really weird)! Wherever you go The Blitz is there!The Blitz Mobile App will not only let you listen to the station on your Android device you can alsoâ¦â¢ Easily click to call, text or emailâ¢ Listen to the station in the backgroundâ¢ Check out our mobile friendly website for station    events and info while you listen â¢ Connect with us on facebookâ¢ Listen to Loper and Randi podcasts and share them with friendsâ¢ Find out songs that we just playedâ¢ Get info on station promotions and contestsâ¢ â¦and even wake up to the sweet sounds of The Blitz with our cool alarm clock function! Download it today and stayed connected with Your Rock Stationâ¦ 99.7 The Blitz!99.7 The Blitz is WRKZ, Columbus OhioNorth American Broadcasting Co. Inc.www.theblitz.com

reviews.title: WTF???
reviews.comment: Hey BLITZ! Love ya man. But your app doesn\'t work! Fix it please. Uninstalling until it\'s fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Zte merit
reviews.comment: Works great wait for it to load took mine about 30 seconds
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: terrible
reviews.comment: I love the Blitz but the app is terrible I had a samsung galaxy prevail and the app hardly working at all now I upgraded to a better phone and it still is junk I would rate 5 stars if they would fix it but they don\'t
reviews.author: jason barry

reviews.title: Works! Rocking my Face Off!
reviews.comment: I read previous posts and saw some poor reviews. There may be a delay in starting but I didn\'t notice it. It definitely works but it should be noted that I am using it via WiFi. It also has an alarm function! You can wake to the Blitz rather than your annoying cell tones! Thumbs up! Download it and rock your face off too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This is my favorite  app i have i love the blitz and where i live the station doesn\'t come in very well so having this app makes it easier to listen to the station and music i love with no static.
reviews.author: Shelby Little

reviews.title: No Audio
reviews.comment: Nothing plays. TuneIn told me their stream was ending and suggested downloading this app.

reviews.title: HTC EVO 4G
reviews.comment: At first, I thought the app wouldn\'t stream. I had to give it about 45-60 seconds to load. It works, but it would be better if it loaded faster. I almost gave up and deleted the app. Glad I didn\'t!
